# RFC Proposal

## Summary

Provide a short description of the proposal.

---

## Motivation

Why is this change necessary?

What problem does it solve?

---

## Detailed Design

Describe the proposed solution.

Include:

- API changes
- Module changes
- Dependency Injection changes
- Migration impact

Code examples are encouraged.

---

## Alternatives Considered

Describe alternative approaches and why they were rejected.

---

## Impact

- Does this introduce breaking changes?
- Does it affect addons?
- Does it affect CLI?
- Migration required?

---

## Open Questions

List any unresolved concerns.

---

This RFC will remain open for discussion before approval by maintainers.
